answers.answer: 10 pounds in 25 weeks is a great weight gain! That's all baby ;) you are right on track. No worries hon
I'm afraid I'll never get good maternity photos because my stomach doesn't look all round like a beachball, looks round at top and flabby at bottom >…<

I agree^^^!!! 10lbs in 25weeks is great!! I'm only 5'1 and weighed 155lbs pre pregnancy. I'm now 35weeks and at my last doctors appt I had already gained 54lbs. So please don't feel bad about those 10lbs. With my first I gained 67lbs.

Im the exact same way...with my first pregnancy I didnt get a pregnant belly until 32 weeks....Im on my second 22+3 and I hae a feeling its gonna be awhile before I show again... but 10 lbs is really good be happy about your health! Im high risk with preeclampsia and gestational diabetes this pregnancy and Im only allowed to gain 11 which ive only gained 6.

I was a 22 before pregnancy and only gained like 8lb so far and im 28wks. My tummy is harder but still nothing like the typical basketball belly skinner women have. In my opinion as long as baby is healthy your tummy shape doesn't matter :) evety pregnancy is beautiful weather your a size 3 or 30. Also baby really starts growing in the last part of the 3rd trimester, so there is a good chance you'll harden up! Best wishes hun x

I was a 22 before pregnancy and only gained like 8lb so far and im 28wks. My tummy is harder but still nothing like the typical basketball belly skinner women have. In my opinion as long as baby is healthy your tummy shape doesn't matter :) evety pregnancy is beautiful weather your a size 3 or 30. Also baby really starts growing in the last part of the 3rd trimester, so there is a good chance you'll harden up! Best wishes hun x

Yea see I'm on my third and even withy first my stomach was like that and its pretty much the same with this one I'm sure ull get rounder but if ur like me the loseness at the botttom might not go away. :( *****!

I'm the same way @angel669 I'm 28wks tomorrow I've actually lost 4lbs from my starting weight I eat everything & throw up nothing but I gained 60lbs with my first one! So I'm round on top & flabby on bottom I'm hoping it'll change
Thank you so much everybody for your comments:)

question: So I got pregnant and was a size 18, very curvy girl. Being pregnant I always crave very unhealthy foods >…< I feel like all the weight I've gained isn't the baby. My tummy stops very round till the bottom then it lays over at the bottom. I'm 25 weeks, will my tummy round out? I've gained 10 pounds throughout the pregnancy.
title: weight
